comments:
build I20040225

- was stepping through some tests in the UI test suite (running as JUnit Plugin 
tests)
- they succeeded, so I resumed and the workbench under test exited

Fixed - added catch clause for exception. I will open a new bug... the methods 
on IJavaThread for getContended/Owned monitors should actually throw 
exceptions in their API.

Fixed the two problematic to throw exceptions. Our interface already specified 
that the exceptions could be thrown - it was just the implementation that was 
hiding the exceptions internally.
